document_title: Septic arthritis: Causes, signs, treatment, prevention
subsection_content: Infectious arthritis can be completely treated when the patient proactively visits the doctor early. Most patients will notice a gradual improvement in symptoms within about 48 hours after starting treatment. If not treated promptly and properly, infectious arthritis can cause permanent joint damage. Therefore, as soon as patients feel pain and swelling in their joints, they need to go to the hospital for diagnosis and quick treatment.
subsection_title: viem khop nhiem khuan.json. Ability to recover after treatment

viem khop nhiem khuan.json. Ability to recover after treatment
Infectious arthritis can be completely treated when the patient proactively visits the doctor early. Most patients will notice a gradual improvement in symptoms within about 48 hours after starting treatment. If not treated promptly and properly, infectious arthritis can cause permanent joint damage. Therefore, as soon as patients feel pain and swelling in their joints, they need to go to the hospital for diagnosis and quick treatment.
